data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.

data.instruction: Inspect route/dispatch state after bookings and verify assignment/ETA/operational telemetry consistency.
data.expectedResult: Route/dispatch records align with bookings and can be used for operations decisions.

requestBody.title: Runner submits snapshots and final report API Trace

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.
